void* AkDeviceSettings::pIOMemory

Pointer for I/O memory allocated by user. This is fed directly to AK::MemoryMgr::CreatePool(). Pass NULL if you want memory to be allocated by the MemoryMgr via AK alloc hooks. If specified, uIOMemorySize, uIOMemoryAlignment and ePoolAttributes are ignored.
